entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning then changing to rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few flurries after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
